ConfigureDrawboardPDF.description: Configure settings for Drawboard PDF with two modes.

ConfigureMonitorSettings.description: Configure monitor settings based on the argument value.

ConfigureOneNote.description: Configure OneNote with different arguments (1 to 4). The Space and Ctrl+Space also work as toggles.

ConfigurePenSettings.description: Configure pen settings for two different modes.

CopyProcessDirectory.description: Copy the directory of the active process and display the path in the tooltip.

InputBoxForAutoSendToggle.description: Toggle auto-send feature for continuous key input based on user input in a dialog box.

ToggleAndExecute.description: Toggle and execute the corresponding ConfigureOneNote function with different arguments.

ToggleAndSend.description: Toggle between sending different key combinations based on the assigned arguments.

ToggleOverlayVisibility.description: Toggle the visibility of the status overlay for the script.

ToggleScript.description: Toggle the activation and deactivation of the script, enabling or disabling hotkeys.

ClickTracker.StartTracking.description: Initializes tracking by clearing previous data, setting tracking flags, and minimizing the GUI window.

ClickTracker.StopTracking.description: Ends tracking, restores GUI visibility, and updates the display with recorded click positions.

ClickTracker.OnMouseClick.description: Captures and stores mouse click coordinates, along with window information on the first click during tracking.

ShortcutTool.AddShortcut.description: Creates a shortcut to the currently active Chrome tab's URL in the selected folder, formatting the title and launching File Explorer as needed.

ShortcutTool.ChangePath.description: Opens a folder picker dialog to select a new default path and updates the GUI and internal state accordingly.
